The notification object is the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScreen] object whose [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScreen/colorSpace] has changed.. This notification does not contain a `userInfo` dictionary.

# colorSpaceDidChangeNotification

**Type Property**

Posted when the color space of the screen has changed.

## Declaration

```swift
class let colorSpaceDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

The notification object is the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScreen] object whose [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSScreen/colorSpace] has changed.. This notification does not contain a `userInfo` dictionary.
title: colorSpaceDidChangeNotification
